languages.text: If the wielder killed an enemy with a melee attack, he can shoot this weapon for free once per round.

traits.locale_text: If the wielder killed an enemy with a melee attack, he can shoot this weapon for free once per round.

languages.text: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Убив цель в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, персонаж до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} может совершить +1 дополнительную дистанционную атаку этим оружием вне лимита атак на ход.

traits.locale_text: When the wielder kills the target with a melee attack for the first time in a round, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their turn.

When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} ile öldürürse bu silahla +1 serbest menzilli saldırı hakkı kazanır. Bu hak, kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek kullanılmazsa ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} ile öldürürse bu silahla +1 serbest menzilli saldırı hakkı kazanır. Bu hak, kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek kullanılmazsa ortadan kalkar.

Kullanan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir hedefi yakın dövüş saldırısı ile öldürürse bu silahla +1 serbest menzilli saldırı hakkı kazanır. Bu hak, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} sonuna dek kullanılmazsa ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata al objetivo con un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, gana +1 ataque a distancia gratuito con esta arma hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata al objetivo con un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo por primera vez en un asalto, gana +1 ataque a distancia gratuito con esta arma hasta el final de su turno.

languages.text: 当装备者本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内首次使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击杀死目标时，装备者可以发动一次无消耗的远程攻击。此效果持续至装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者本轮内首次使用近战攻击杀死目标时，装备者可以发动一次无消耗的远程攻击。此效果持续至装备者回合结束。

languages.text: La première fois que l'utilisateur tue la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il gagne +1 attaque à distance gratuite avec cette arme jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La première fois que l'utilisateur tue la cible d'une attaque de mêlée lors d'un round, il gagne +1 attaque à distance gratuite avec cette arme jusqu'à la fin de son tour.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めて{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}によってターゲットを倒した場合、その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了までこの武器による自由な範囲攻撃に+1を付与される。
languages.original_text: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がラウンドで初めて近接攻撃によってターゲットを倒した場合、そのターンの終了までこの武器による自由な範囲攻撃に+1を付与される。
使用者がラウンドで初めて近接攻撃によってターゲットを倒した場合、そのターンの終了までこの武器による自由な範囲攻撃に+1を付与される。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger das Ziel in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erstmals mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} tötet, erhält er bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +1 kostenlosen Fernkampfangriff mit dieser Waffe.
languages.original_text: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger das Ziel in einer Runde erstmals mit einem Nahkampfangriff tötet, erhält er bis zum Ende seines Zuges +1 kostenlosen Fernkampfangriff mit dieser Waffe.

languages.text: Убив цель в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, персонаж до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} может совершить +1 дополнительную дистанционную атаку этим оружием вне лимита атак на ход.
languages.original_text: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Убив цель в ближнем бою впервые за раунд, персонаж до конца своего хода может совершить +1 дополнительную дистанционную атаку этим оружием вне лимита атак на ход.
Убив цель в ближнем бою впервые за раунд, персонаж до конца своего хода может совершить +1 дополнительную дистанционную атаку этим оружием вне лимита атак на ход.
